notes.note:
We are continually making improvements and this release brings you the following update:

* Newly supported add-ons: FoxyProxy, Bitwarden, AdGuard AdBlocker, Tomato Clock, LeechBlock NG, Web Archives, and Ghostery. See all our supported add-ons [here][1].


  [1]: https://addons.mozilla.org/android/

text: Introducing our latest release of Firefox for Android — Firefox Daylight, dramatically redesigned to be faster, easy to use, customizable, and private.
title: Firefox for Android 83.0 Release
